column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////What a terrific spot! Came here to help a friend celebrate her business successes. This place seems like a small place on the outside
column2: but it's plenty big inside. Nice crown...even on a Thursday night. The food is delicious and served tapas style so you can try a number of dishes without over eating (that much). Here is something on the menu for everyone to enjoy. The sangria is outta this world. Flavorful
column4: smooth...and served in big glasses. Be careful tho
column5: the alcohol in stuff creeps up on you!
